high_descs: Turn left and face the counter.
Take a step to the right.
Place the candle on the toilet tank, in front and to the left of the toilet paper roll.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle on a toilet tank lid.

high_descs: Turn left and walk to the counter top.
Pick up the green candle from the counter.
Walk slightly to the right towards the toilet.
Put the candle on the top of the toilet, in front of and to the left of the toilet paper.
anns.task_desc: Move a candle from a counter top to the top of a toilet.

high_descs: Pick the candle up off of the counter.
Turn all the way around and face the counter again.
Place the candle to the left of the toilet paper on top of the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Place a candle from the counter on top of the toilet.
